ISSUE.TITLE: Modeler: Interrupting flag of Start Timer Event cannot be changed
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: **Describe the bug** The interrupting flag of the Start Timer Event cannot be changed because the property is not visible. ![StartTimerEvent](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/35045227/196217471-a1c82879-c276-4389-8c87-4573ab1b5f4e.png) **Expected behavior** The interrupting flag of a Start Timer Event can be changed in the modeler. **Code** **Additional context** Flowable 6.7.3-SNAPSHOT

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: Apache http client5 support and change default (#3493) Add support for Apache Http Client 5 and use it by default in the flowable-http module

COMMIT.MESSAGE: Fixed visibility of start timer event interrupting flag (#3494)
Fixed visibility of start timer event interrupting flag (#3494)
